author: johnsuggestions
title: Better than others in the area
text:
I have stayed at several of the other similar hotels in this neighbourhood and this hotel is certainly better.
I am here for one night business trips and everything works as I would hope. Painless and friendly check in. Room ready and clean. Wifi good. Breakfast much better than other similar places.
I had a small single room which was all functional- only improvement would be more wall sockets! Steep stairs to 2nd floor but lift works just fine.
Two minutes to the Forum for an early morning stroll?
